Hi. I'm Adam Mazel.

I'm the Digital Scholarship and Instruction Librarian at Union College in Schenectady, NY.
I work at the intersection of digital and open scholarship: teaching how to critically engage with computing technology to make research and pedagogy more insightful and accessible.

My M.S. in Library and Information Science is from Simmons University, and my Ph.D. in English Language and Literature is from the University of Michigan.
